00027   void HeaderBuilder::encode(uint8_t **bufp) {
00028     Header::Common *mheader;
00029     mheader = (Header::Common *)*bufp;
00030     mheader->version = Header::VERSION;
00031     mheader->protocol = m_protocol;
00032     mheader->flags = m_flags;
00033     mheader->header_len = sizeof(Header::Common);
00034     mheader->id = m_id;
00035     mheader->gid = m_group_id;
00036     mheader->total_len = m_total_len;
00037     (*bufp) += sizeof(Header::Common);
00038   }
